title: Creamy Turkey Breast and Red Pepper Saut√©
ingredients: ['3 tablespoons oil', '1 large onion, sliced thinly', '2 red peppers, cut into strips', '400g turkey breast fillets, cut into small strips', '3 garlic cloves, finely chopped', '1 tablespoon paprika', '1 tablespoon ground cumin', '2 tablespoons tomato puree', '100ml red wine', '250ml cream', '200ml soured cream', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper', '1 packet fresh noodles', 'chopped fresh parsley, to serve']
